name: Letani Ospha
title: Unity Through Peace
abilityText: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship: that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

name: Trilossa Aun Mirik
title: Scorn of Ylir
abilityWindow: When a player produces ground forces in a system:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card: that player may place those units on any planets they control in that system and any adjacent systems.

name: The Stillness of Stars
title: Oppressive Silence
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to convert their commodities to trade goods and capture 1 unit from their reinforcements that has a cost equal to or lower than their commodity value.

name: Emissary Taivra
title: The Azure Whisper
abilityWindow: After a player activates a system that contains a non-delta wormhole:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card: if you do, that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain a wormhole during this tactical action.

name: Acamar
title: The Gift of Night
abilityWindow: After a player moves ships into a system that does not contain any planets:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card: that player gains 1 command token.

name: Carth of the Golden Sands
title: Tripartite Governor
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

name: Doctor Sucaban
title: Head of Medical "R&D"
abilityWindow: When a player spends resources to research:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove any number of their infantry from the game board. For each unit removed, reduce the resources spent by 1.

name: Xander Alexin Victori III
title: Miracle Worker
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow any player to spend commodities as if they were trade goods.

name: I48S
title: Enhancer Prodigy
abilityWindow: After a player activates a system:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replace 1 of their infantry in the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements.

name: Viscount Unlenn
title: The Dunlain Scourge
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat round:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system: that ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

name: Jae Mir Kan
title: Archon of Prosperity
abilityWindow: When you would spend a command token during the secondary ability of a strategic action:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to remove 1 of the active player's command tokens from the board and use it instead.

name: Suffi An
title: 90% Smuggler, 110% Energy
abilityWindow: After the Pillage faction ability is used against another player:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card: if you do, you and that player each draw 1 action card.

name: Umbat
title: Forgemaster
abilityText: Exhaust this card to choose a player: that player may produce up to 2 units that each have a cost of 4 or less in a system that contains one of their war suns or their flagship.

name: Z'eu
title: Agent of the Nefishh
abilityText: Exhaust this card and choose a player. That player may perform a tactical action in a non-home system without placing a command token. That system still counts as being activated.

name: Garv and Gunn
title: Plucky Archaeologists
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to explore 1 of their planets.

name: Nekro Malleon
title: The Shifting Host
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose a player: that player may discard 1 action card or spend 1 command token from their command sheet to gain 2 trade goods.

name: Artuno the Betrayer
title: Sumerian Overseer
abilityWindow: When you gain trade goods from the supply:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to place an equal number of trade goods on this card. When this card readies, gain the trade goods on this card.

name: Field Marshal Mercer
title: Shikrai General
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove 2 of their ground forces from the game board and place them on planets they control in the active system.

name: The Thundarian
title: Temporal Engima
abilityWindow: After the "Roll Dice" step of combat:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card. If you do, hits are not assigned to either player's units. Return to the start of this combat round's "Roll Dice" step.

name: T'ro
title: Tekklar Legionnaire
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's tactical action:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card: if you do, that player may place 2 infantry from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.

name: Captain Mendosa
title: Captain of the Fifth Fleet
abilityWindow: After a player activates a system:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value.

name: Evelyn DeLouis
title: Master Tactician
abilityWindow: At the start of a ground combat round:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ground force in the active system: that ground force rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

name: Tellurian
title: The Protector
abilityWindow: When a hit is produced against a unit:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to cancel that hit.

name: Berekar Berekon
title: Arbiter of Divine Right
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of a player's units use Production:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 2.

name: Ggrocuto Rinn
title: The King's Shield
abilityText: Exhaust this card to ready any planet: if that planet is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control, you may remove 1 infantry from that planet and return it to its reinforcements.

name: Brother Milor
title: Purifed by Fire
abilityWindow: After a player's unit is destroyed:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 2 fighters in the destroyed unit's system if it was a ship, or 2 infantry if it was a ground force.

name: Ssruu
title: Clever, Clever Ssruu
abilityText: This card has the text ability of each other player's agent, even if that agent is exhausted.

name: HolyTispoon
title: Really ties the Community together
abilityWindow: When a player would research a unit upgrade:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to gain a different unit upgrade that has the same amount of prerequisites.

name: Shipmonger Zxknck
title: Forgeworld Merchant
abilityText: Exhaust this card to choose 1 player: that player may place 1 cruiser or 1 destroyer from their reinforcements in a system that contains their ships. Then, if you chose another player, gain 2 commodities.

name: C.O.O. Mgur
title: Daft Tradesman
abilityText: Exhaust this card and choose 1 player. For each Fragment token on your faction sheet, that player gains 1 commodity. For each commodity they would gain in excess of their commodity value, they gain 1 trade good instead.

name: Tox
title: Fleshcrafter
abilityWindow: After a player activates a system:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to increase the capacity value of 1 of their ships by 2, or allow that ship to gain a capacity value of 2, until the end of this tactical action.

name: George Nobin
title: Esteemed Merchantman
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's tactical action:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to spend 2 trade goods or 2 commodities to place 1 space dock from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.

name: Operator Kkavras
title: Subspace Grapple
abilityWindow: At the END of a player's turn:
abilityText: Exhaust this card to allow that player to remove 1 of their command tokens from the game board and place that token in an adjacent system that contains 1 or more of their structures and none of their command tokens.

name: Skhot Unit X-12
title: Watcher
abilityWindow: When a player discards or purges an action card:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to draw 1 action card.

name: Jgin Faru
title: Chancellor of Immigration
abilityWindow: When a player commits 1 or more units to a planet during invasion:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 1 infantry from their reinforcements on that planet.

name: Allant
title: Elder Voice
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 player. That player may perform up to 1 action.Then, look at the top card of the agenda deck; you may discard that agenda card.

name: Cordo Haved
title: Friendly Diplomat
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to exhaust 1 planet they control. If they do, they may choose and resolve the ability of 1 legendary planet ability card that is in a player's play area, without exhausting that card.

name: Sal Gavda
title: Black Market Dealer
abilityWindow: At the start of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove an attachment from a non-home planet they control and attach it to a non-home planet they control other than Mecatol Rex adjacent to that planet's system.

name: Skarvald & Torvar
title: Raid Heralds
abilityWindow: When the active player produces 1 or more hits during a round of combat:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to produce 1 additional hit.

name: Becece
title: Caretaker of Worlds
abilityWindow: When a player produces 1 or more units:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to either produce 2 additional units or gain 1 trade good.

name: Durran
title: Ember of the Union
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to apply +3 to the total PRODUCTION value of that player's units.

name: Clodho
title: Speaker
abilityWindow: After a player explores a legendary planet or a planet that has a technology specialty:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to gain 2 trade goods.

name: Merkismathr Asvand
title: Marshal of Trade
abilityWindow: At the start of a combat:
abilityText: Exhaust this card to move a Glory token to the active system, if able. Then, the active player may gain a number of commodities equal to the number of neighbors they have.

name: Captain Dust
title: Artifact Broker
abilityWindow: At the start of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to reveal the top 2 cards of an exploration deck that matches a planet they control. They gain any relic fragments that they revealed and discard the rest.

name: Disciple Fran
title: Meditative Prodigy
abilityText: Exhaust this card to allow a player to redistribute 1 of their command tokens on their command sheet.

name: Queen Lucreia
title: Atonement and Punishment
abilityWindow: When a player wins a ground combat:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to take 1 relic fragment their opponent owns, at random, if able.

name: Tox
title: Plague Queen
abilityWindow: After a player loses or draws a ground combat:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replenish their commodities; place a number of infantry equal to 1 less than their commodity value on 1 planet you control.

name: Vassa Hagi
title: Plunderer of Lost Arks
abilityText: you may exhaust this card to allow that player to discard 1 exploration card they drew and draw another.

name: Vasra Ivo
title: Intelligence Officer
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 2 fighters from their reinforcements in the space area of a system that contains 1 or more of their ships.

name: Udosh B'rtul
title: Grove Tender
abilityWindow: When a player would spend influence:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to spend the resources of 1 non-home planet they control as influence, in addition to its influence.

name: Logic Machina
title: Weapons Development
abilityWindow: After a player gains a unit upgrade technology:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to spend 1 command token from their strategy pool to research 1 technology of the same color as any 1 of that unit upgrade's prerequisites.

name: Walik
title: Dull Green
abilityWindow: When a player produces 1 or more units in a system:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 1 of the produced units in the space area of an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships.

name: Lactarius Indigo
title: Omen Caller
abilityWindow: Before a player rolls a die:
abilityText: You may instead exhaust this card and choose 1 Omen die near the Myko-Mentori player's faction sheet. Resolve that die roll as if it had the result of that Omen die.

name: Suldhan Wraeg
title: Shrouded Advisor
abilityWindow: When a player would use 1 unit's non-PRODUCTION unit ability in a system that contains or is adjacent to an anomaly, you may exhaust this card to prevent that unit from using that unit ability.

name: Sal Sparrow
title: The Privateer
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow 1 player with 1 or more ships in the active system to place 1 destroyer from their reinforcements in that system. Then, you may resolve 1 transaction with that player.

name: Baggil Wildpaw
title: Political Haggler
abilityWindow: After a player exhausts a cultural, hazardous, or industrial planet they control:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to ready a planet they control of a different trait than that planet.

name: Priestess Tuh,The Edifier
abilityWindow: After a player researches a technology:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to produce 1 ship in their home system or a system that contains a planet they control that has a technology specialty.

name: Rond Bri'ay
title: Master of Operations
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to gain 1 command token.

name: Davish S'Norri
title: Logistical Expeditor
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system. During this invasion, that ship may use its ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE as if it were BOMBARDMENT.

name: Yudri Sukhov
title: Developer
abilityWindow: At the start of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to choose 1 planet they control. That player gains a number of commodities equal to that planet's influence value.

name: Yvin Korduul
title: Political Gambler
abilityWindow: After a player gains control of a planet:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to draw 1 action card.

name: Solis Morden
title: Research and Development
abilityWindow: When a player spends resources to research:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to spend the influence of 1 planet they control as resources.

name: Zelian A
title: The Mutilator
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow the active player to replace 1 of their infantry in the space area of the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements.

name: Dirzuga Rophal
title: Peace Through Strength

abilityText: You may produce 1 unit in that system.
unlockCondition: Have 12 ground forces on planets you control.

name: Trrakan Aun Zulok
title: Strike Wing Commander
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability:
abilityText: You may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.
unlockCondition: Have 6 units that have Anti-Fighter Barrage, Space Cannon, or Bombardment on the game board.

name: That Which Molds Flesh
title: Grisly Abomination
abilityWindow: When you produce fighter or infantry units:
abilityText: Up to 2 of those units do not count against your Production limit.

name: Sai Seravus
title: Gatewarden

unlockCondition: Have units in 3 systems that contain alpha or beta wormholes.

name: Xuange
title: The Archivist
abilityWindow: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 of your command tokens:
abilityText: You may return that token to your reinforcements.
unlockCondition: Be neighbors with all other players.

name: Gila the Silvertongue
title: Kenaran Ambassador
abilityText: You may spend any number of trade goods: cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

name: Ta Zern

abilityWindow: After you roll dice for a unit ability:
abilityText: You may reroll any of those dice.

name: Suffi An
title: Working Multiple Angles

abilityText: You may perform an additional action.
unlockCondition: Spend 1 trade good after you play an action card that has a component action

name: 2RAM
title: Integrated Systems Engineer
abilityText: Units that have Planetary Shield do not prevent you from using Bombardment.
unlockCondition: Have 4 dreadnoughts on the game board.

name: Rear Admiral Farran

abilityText: You may gain 1 trade good.

name: Il Na Viroset
title: Archon of Virtue

unlockCondition: Have 2 other factions' command tokens in your fleet pool.

name: S'ula Mentarion
title: Everyone's "Best Friend"

abilityText: You may force your opponent to give you 1 promissory note from their hand.
unlockCondition: Have 4 cruisers on the game board.

name: Magmus
title: Gashlai Tribune
abilityWindow: After you spend a token from your strategy pool:
abilityText: You may gain 1 trade good.

name: M'aban
title: Crystalline Sorceress

unlockCondition: Have ground forces in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system.

name: Dart and Tai
title: Adrenaline Junkies
abilityWindow: After you gain control of a planet that was controlled by another player:
abilityText: You may explore that planet.

name: Nekro Acidos
title: Obsidian Reaper
abilityText: You may draw 1 action card.
unlockCondition: Own 3 technologies. A "Valefar Assimilator" technology counts only if its X or Y token is on a technology.

name: Navarch Feng

abilityText: You can produce your flagship without spending resources.

name: Rowl Sarring

unlockCondition: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

name: G'hom Sek'kus

abilityText: You can commit up to 1 ground force from each planet in the active system and each planet in adjacent systems that do not contain 1 of your command tokens.

name: Claire Gibson
title: Voice of the People

abilityText: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.
unlockCondition: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 resources.

name: Tungstantus
title: The Gardener
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of your units use Production:
abilityText: You may gain 1 trade good.
unlockCondition: Have 5 structures on the game board.

name: Rickar Rickani

unlockCondition: Control Mecatol Rex or enter into a combat in the Mecatol Rex system.

name: Elder Qanoj
title: The Doom from Kklaj
abilityText: Each planet you exhaust to cast votes provides 1 additional vote. Game effects cannot prevent you from voting on an agenda.
unlockCondition: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 influence.

name: Brother Omar
title: Spinner Devotee
abilityText: This card satisfies a green technology prerequisite. When you research a tech owned by another player, you may return 1 of your infantry to reinforcements to ignore its prerequisites.
unlockCondition: Use one of your faction abilities.

name: So Ata
title: Loyal Only to a Point
abilityWindow: After another player activates a system that contains your units:
abilityText: You may look at that player's action cards, promissory notes, or secret objectives.

name: Somno
title: Graphics Tinker
abilityText: You may treat unit upgrades your opponent owns as if you would own them as well.
unlockCondition: Control 3 planets that have tech specialties.

name: Designer TckVsk
title: Diligent Retro-Engineer

abilityText: You may spend 6 resources to gain the corresponding unit's unit upgrade technology.
unlockCondition: Have 4 Axis Order cards of different unit types in 1 or more players' play areas.

name: C.M.O. Ranc
title: Marketing Guru
abilityText: Your commodity value is increased by 1.
unlockCondition: Have 3 Fragment tokens on your faction sheet.

name: Silas Deriga
title: Necrosage

abilityText: When you would destroy 1 of your opponent's infantry, you may instead replace that unit with 1 from your reinforcements.
unlockCondition: Have 6 infantry and 6 fighters on the game board.

name: Henry Storcher
title: Starbase Commander

abilityText: Gain 1 commodity. Your ships may treat systems that contain 1 or more of your space docks as adjacent to each other.
unlockCondition: Have 1 space dock on the game board that is not adjacent to your home system.

name: Spc. Phquaiset

name: Koryl Ferax

abilityText: You may discard 1 action card to place or move 1 mech onto that planet.
unlockCondition: Have 10 or more infantry on the board.

name: Clona Bathru
title: Founder of Bathru Robotics
abilityText: This card satisfies a red technology prerequisite. At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 3 or more different types of your non-fighter ships, produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships.
unlockCondition: Research a ship unit upgrade technology.

name: Kadryn
title: Highest Grace
abilityWindow: When any game effect would allow you to score a public objective
abilityText: You may instead draw 1 secret objective.
unlockCondition: Have 1 or more laws in play.

name: President Cyhn

abilityText: If you have 1 or more ships in the active system, you may produce 1 ship in that system.
unlockCondition: Each non-legendary planet on the game board is controlled.

name: Quaxdol Junitas
title: The Unseen Hand

abilityText: You may ready 1 planet you control. Explore that planet, if able.
unlockCondition: Have the outcome you voted for or predicted on an agenda resolved.

name: Jarl Vel & Jarl Jotrun
title: Raid Leaders

abilityText: You may gain 1 trade good.
unlockCondition: Have 2 flagships on the game board.

name: Ceie Doleegueaunm
title: Abyssal Queen

unlockCondition: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Voldun
title: Forge Lord

abilityText: You may increase the total PRODUCTION value of those units by 1 for each space dock you control.
unlockCondition: Control non-fighter ships with a total combined cost value of at least 10 in 1 system.

name: Lachis
title: Reader
abilityText: This card satisfies a yellow technology prerequisite.When you cast at least 1 vote, cast 1 additional vote for every 2 technologies you own.
unlockCondition: Win a combat in a system that contains a legendary planet or a planet that has a technology specialty.

name: Sdallari Tvungovot
title: Marshal Engineer

abilityText: Reroll the combat dice of up to 4 of your fighters or infantry, applying +1 to the results - the Kjalengard player captures any units that reroll dice this way and do not produce at least 1 hit.
unlockCondition: Have 2 Glory tokens on the game board.

name: Kado S'mah-Qar
title: Coordinator
abilityText: This card satisfies a blue technology prerequisite. When you retreat, if the active system does not contain 1 of your command tokens, you do not place a command token in the system your ships retreated to.

name: Issac of Sinci
title: Kinematics Specialist
abilityText: Apply +1 to each of your unit's ability rolls.
unlockCondition: During the action phase, ready 1 of your technologies.

name: Queen Lorena

abilityText: You may cancel 1 hit produced against your units.
unlockCondition: Destroy the last of a player's units in a system.

name: Silas Deriga
title: Necrosage

unlockCondition: Have 6 infantry and 6 fighters on the game board.

name: Master Halbert
title: Quartermaster
abilityText: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

name: Dhume Tathu

abilityText: You may choose 1 of your units in that combat, that unit rolls 1 additional combat die.
unlockCondition: Have 3 trap attachments on the game board.

name: Hkot Tokal

unlockCondition: Win a ground combat on a planet you do not control.

name: Assault Machina

abilityText: For each infantry you transport, you may replace that unit with 1 fighter. You may use the SPACE CANNON of 1 of your units against ships that are adjacent to that unit's system.

name: Komat

abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat while you are not the active player:
abilityText: Choose 1 of your non-fighter ships in the active system to gain SUSTAIN DAMAGE until the end of combat.

name: Amanita Muscaria
title: Rampant Growth
abilityWindow: After another player produces 1 or more hits against your units during space combat:
abilityText: You may spend 1 commodity or 1 trade good to cancel 1 of those hits.
unlockCondition: Have 4 commodities on your faction sheet.

name: Thussad Krath

unlockCondition: Have units in 2 different non-home anomalies.

name: Jack Hallard

name: Knak Halfear

name: Bishop Ulin

unlockCondition: Have a technology with 2 or more prerequisites.

name: B-Unit 205643a
title: Predominant Constructor

unlockCondition: Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 7 in a single system.

name: Fillipo Rois
title: Labor Relations Specialist

unlockCondition: Have 6 of your destroyers on the game board.

name: Komdar Borodin
title: Banker
abilityWindow: At the start of the status phase:
abilityText: Gain 1 trade good for each secret objective you have scored and 1 commodity for each public objective you have scored.
unlockCondition: Have 1 or more different players' control tokens on your faction sheet for every 2 players in this game.

name: Pyndil Gonsuul
title: Strike Team Coordinator
abilityText: Choose 1 ship you control with a capacity value, apply +2 to that value during this tactical action.
unlockCondition: Control 3 planets that each have the same trait.

name: Vera Khage

abilityText: You may ignore 1 prerequisite on that technology.
unlockCondition: 2 other players control 1 or more planets that have Branch Office attachments.

name: Zelian B
title: The Hunter
abilityText: Each of your Dreadnoughts and War Suns without ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE gains ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 5.
unlockCondition: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that contain an asteroid field.

name: Letani Miasmiala
title: Strength Through Unity
abilityText: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then, purge this card.

name: Mirik Aun Sissiri
title: Flightmaster
abilityText: Move any number of your ships from any systems to any number of other systems that contain 1 of your command tokens and no other players' ships. Then, purge this card. [Note: This can move/carry ground forces and fighters up to capacity, but cannot land them]

name: It Feeds on Carrion
title: Twisted Horror
abilityText: Each other player rolls a die for each of his non-fighter ships that are in or adjacent to a system that contains a dimensional tear. on a 1-3, capture that unit. If this causes a player's ground forces or fighter to be removed, also capture those units. Then, purge this card.

name: Riftwalker Meian
title: Shaleri Guardian
abilityText: Swap the positions of any 2 systems that contain wormholes or your units, other than the Creuss system and the wormhole nexus. Then, purge this card.

name: Conservator Procyon
title: One with the Void
abilityText: Place 1 frontier token in each system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token. Then, explore each frontier token that is in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.

name: Harrugh Gefhara
title: The Nascent Twilight
abilityName: Galactic Securities Net: Sanction of the Quieron
abilityWindow: When 1 or more of your units use Production:
abilityText: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of Production. If you do, purge this card.

name: Rin, the Master's Legacy
title: Perfected Being
abilityName: Genetic Memory: Brilliance of the Hylar
abilityText: For each non-unit ugprade technology you own, you may replace that technology with any technology of the same color from the deck. Then, purge this card.

name: Kuuasi Aun Jalatai
title: Keleres Tribunii
abilityWindow: At the start of a round of of space combat in a system that contains a planet you control:
abilityText: Place your flagship and up to a total of 2 cruisers and/or destroyers from your reinforcements in the active system. Then, purge this card.

name: Odlynn Myrr
title: Keleres Tribunii
abilityText: You may cast up to 6 additional votes on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. For each player that votes for another outcome, gain 1 trade good and 1 command token. Then, purge this card.

name: Harka Leeds
title: Keleres Tribunii
abilityName: Erwan's Covenant: The Winds of Change
abilityText: Reveal cards from the action card deck until you reveal 3 action cards that have component actions. Draw those cards and shuffle the rest back into the action card deck. Then, purge this card.

name: The Helmsman
title: The Last Record
abilityText: Choose 1 system that does not contain other players' ships. you may move your flagship and any number of your dreadnoughts from other systems into the chosen system. Then, purge this card.[Note: This can move/carry ground forces and fighters up to capacity, but cannot land them]

name: Darktalon Treilla
title: Void Revenant
abilityText: Place this card near the game board. the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by laws or by the number of command tokens in your fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

name: Airo Shir Aur
title: Archon of Command
abilityText: Move all units in the space area of any system to an adjacent system that contains a different player's ships. Space combat is resolved in that system. neither player can retreat or resolve abilities that would move their ships. Then, purge this card.

name: Ipswitch, Loose Cannon
title: Mercenary Raider
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat that you are participating in:
abilityText: You may purge this card. if you do, for each other player's ship that is destroyed during this combat, place 1 ship of that type from your reinforcements in the active system.

name: Adjudicator Ba'al
title: Starscourge
abilityWindow: After you move a war sun into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex:
abilityText: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Muaat supernova tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

name: The Oracle
title: Corrupted Mind
abilityName: C-Radium Geometry: Poison of the Nefishh
abilityWindow: At the end of the status phase:
abilityText: You may force each other player to give you 1 promissory note from their hand. If you do, purge this card.

name: Hesh and Prit
title: Architect Savants
abilityText: Gain 1 relic and perform the secondary ability of up to 2 readied or unchosen strategy cards. during this action, spend command tokens from your reinforcements instead of your strategy pool. Then, purge this card.

name: UNIT.DSGN.FLAYESH
title: Recursive Tyrant
abilityText: Choose a planet that has a technology specialty in a system that contains your units. Destroy any other player's units on that planet. Gain trade goods equal to the planet's combined resource and influence values and gain 1 technology that matches the specialty of that planet. Then, purge this card.

name: Ahk-Syl Siven
title: Sole Survivor
abilityText: Place this card near the game board. your flagship and units it transports can move out of systems that contain your command tokens during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

name: Sh'val, Harbinger
title: Master of the First
abilityWindow: After you move ships into the active system:
abilityText: You may skip directly to the "Commit Ground Forces" step. If you do, after you commit ground forces to land on planets, purge this card and return each of your ships in the active system to your reinforcements.

name: Gurno Aggero
title: Captain of the First Fleet
abilityName: Armageddon Relay: The Lay of Lisis
abilityText: Choose 1 system that is adjacent to 1 of your space docks. Destroy all other players' infantry and fighters in that system. Then, purge this card.

name: Jace X, 4th Air Legion
title: Federation Hero
abilityText: Remove each of your command tokens from the game board and return them to your reinforcements. Then, purge this card.

name: Ul the Progenitor
title: Elysium's Core
abilityText: Ready Elysium and attach this card to it. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 3, and it gains the Space Cannon 5 (x3) ability as if it were a unit.

name: Mathis Mathinus
title: Reclamation Executor
abilityName: Imperial Seal: Sins of the Father
abilityText: Perform the primary ability of any strategy card. Then, choose any number of other players. Those players may perform the secondary ability of that strategy card. Then, purge this card.

name: Xxekir Grom
title: The Council's Heart
abilityName: Political Data Nexus: Voice of the Council
abilityText: combine the values of their resources and influence. Treat the combined value as if it were both resources and influence.

name: Dannel of the Tenth
title: High Priest of Yin
abilityName: Quantum Dissemination: Blessing of the Yin
abilityText: Commit up to 3 infantry from your reinforcements to any non-home planets and resolve invasions on those planets. Players cannot use Space Cannon against these units. Then, purge this card.

name: Kyver, Blade and Key
title: Guild Assassin
abilityText: Each other player shows you 1 action card from their hand. For each player, you may either take that card or force that player to discard 3 random action cards from their hand. Then, purge this card.

name: TerTerro
title: Botfather
abilityName: Who cares for the laws of physics anyway?
abilityText: Place this card near the game board. When you produce units you may place them in any one system that contains one of your ships during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

name: Demi-Queen Mdcksssk
title: Commissioner of Profits
abilityText: Purge this card and give 1 or more Axis Order cards in your play area to 1 or more other players:for each Axis Order card you give to another player, you may force that player to give you 1 promissory note from their hand.

name: C.E.O. Ken Tucc
title: Visionary Explorer
abilityText: Purge this card to explore each planet you control in any order.

name: Speygh
title: Blightmaster
abilityText: Attach this card to 1 of your strategy cards. Its initiative value is 9. Non-Blex Players may only resolve 1 clause of this strategy card's primary ability and must spend 1 additional command token from their strategy pool to resolve the secondary ability of this strategy card.

name: Titus Flavius
title: Councilman
abilityWindow: After a player activates a system other than Mecatol Rex:
abilityText: You may place 1 space dock on a planet you control in the active system, if able, replenish your commodities, and use the PRODUCTION ability of each of your units in the active system. Then, purge this card.

name: Thakt Clqua
title: Polemarch
abilityText: Gather units from your reinforcements up to equal to your starting units. Place these units, in any combination, in the space area of any systems that contain 1 of your structures and no other players' ships, or on planets you control. Then, purge this card.

name: The Voice United
title: Psionic Maelstrom
abilityText: Draw and reveal a number of action cards from the action card deck equal to 1 more than the number of players in the game, give 1 to each other player in the game and keep the rest. Each other player must discard 1 action card. Then, purge this card.

name: Verrisus Ypru
title: Former Admiral of the Unrelenting Battlegroup
abilityName: Defense Matrix Overload - Volatile EMP Burst
abilityWindow: After the "Roll Dice" step of space combat:
abilityText: You may purge this card. If you do, all ships in the active system become damaged. During this round of space combat your ships cannot be destroyed.

name: Midir - Living Will
title: Golden Order
abilityText: For each Sigil on the game board, draw 1 Agenda. Reveal and resolve each agenda in any order as if you had cast 1 vote for an outcome of your choice. Other players cannot resolve abilities during this action. Then, purge this card.

name: Count Otto P'may
title: Inspiring Rhetorician
abilityName: Heart of Rebellion - Freedom or Death
abilityText: Ready a non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that you control, remove all units on that planet and attach this card to it. Units cannot be committed to, produced on, or placed on this planet.

name: Banua Gowen
title: Administrator of Minds (Florzen)
abilityText: Place 2 fighters from your reinforcements in each system that contains 1 or more planets you control and no other player's ships. Then, you may remove 1 attachment from any planet in a non-home system that contains 1 or more of your ships and attach it to 1 planet in your home system. Then, purge this card.

name: Korela
title: The Lady
abilityText: Purge this card to destroy all units on a non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that is adjacent to a system that contains 1 of your flagships.

name: Kantrus
title: The Lord
abilityText: Purge this card to choose 1 non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that does not contain another player's units and is adjacent to a system that contains 1 of your flagships. Gain control of that planet. Then, ready that planet.

name: Nmenmede
title: Ghoti All Mother
abilityText: For each system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may replace 1 of your non-fighter ships in that system with a ship from your reinforcements that has a cost value of up to 2 greater than the cost value of that ship. Then, purge this card.

name: Gorthrim
title: Chief of Expeditions
abilityText: Reveal cards from any non-frontier exploration decks until you reveal up to 3 attachments, if able. Attach those cards to any planets you control of the corresponding planet type, and discard the rest. Then, purge this card.

name: Atropha
title: Weaver
abilityText: Draw 3 objective cards from 1 of the public objective decks. Choose up to 1 of those cards to replace an objective card on a player's faction sheet, and return the others to the bottom of their corresponding decks. Then, purge this card.

name: Ygegnad, The Thunder
title: Honorary Skald
abilityName: A Tale of Legends - For Eternal Glory
abilityText: For each system that contains a Glory token, remove up to 1 command token in or adjacent to that system from the game board and gain 1 command token, if able. Then, purge this card.

name: Dorrahn Griphyn
title: The Collector
abilityText: Draw a number of relic cards up to an amount equal to the number of players in the game, choose 1 to gain, and return the rest to the relic deck. Then, shuffle that deck and purge this card.

name: Wonell the Silent
title: Grandmaster of the Order
abilityName: Coil Overcharge - Streaks in the Night
abilityText: Place this card near the game board. During this game round, after you perform a component action, you may use 1 of your unit's SPACE CANNON against ships in or adjacent to that unit's system, without rolling additional dice. At the end of this game round, purge this card.

name: Queen Nadalia
title: Life and Death
abilityName: Calling of the Queens - Mother Goddesses
abilityText: You may purge this card to choose and take up to 1 of your opponent's relics. Then, for each planet you control that is a legendary planet or has a technology specialty, gain 1 command token.

name: Speygh
title: Blightmaster
abilityText: Attach this card to 1 of your strategy cards. Its initiative value is 9. Non-Kyro Players may only resolve 1 clause of this strategy cards primary ability.

name: The Venerable
title: Keeper of Myths
abilityText: Draw and reveal up to 3 relics. For each relic that started this action in a player's play area, gain 1 command token. Then, you may swap that relic for 1 of the revealed relics or relics in a player's play area. Then, shuffle the remaining relics into the relic deck and purge this card.

name: Khaz-Rin Li-Zho
title: Empress
abilityText: You may attach, or remove and attach, each Trap card to a planet on the game board. Place a total of up to 12 fighters in any number of systems that contain 1 or more planets with Trap attachments and no other player's ships. Then, purge this card.

name: Vehl-Tikar
title: Arch Druid
abilityText: Purge this card to choose up to 4 planets. Exhaust or ready each of those planets.

name: Wrath Machina
title: AI Mainframe
abilityText: Place up to 3 PDS units from your reinforcements on planets you control and choose 1 system. Your PDS units may use their SPACE CANNON on ships in that system, and BOMBARDMENT against units on 1 planet in that system. Then, purge this card.

name: Bayan
title: Deep Magenta
abilityText: Purge this card to choose 1 ship you control in each system. For each of those units, you may place 1 unit of that type from your reinforcements in the space area of that unit's system, if able.

name: Coprinus Comatus
title: Necromancer
abilityWindow: When another player's hero would be purged:
abilityText: Instead, attach it to this card. You may resolve this card as if it instead had the text of any single hero attached to this card. When this card is purged, purge each of its attachments as well.

name: Kwill Drakkon
title: Star-Crowned King
abilityName: Singularity Cradle - Eye of the Abyss
abilityText: Each unit on the game board with SUSTAIN DAMAGE, other than your mechs, becomes damaged, if able. Place this card near the game board. You may treat each unit you control as adjacent to the system that contains the Wound token until the end of this game round. At the end of this game round, purge this card.

name: Starsails
title: Mercenary King
abilityText: Place this card near the game board, until the end of this game round, each of your planets gains the PRODUCTION 3 ability as if it were a unit. At the end of this game round, purge this card.

name: Pahn Silverfur
title: Council Speaker
abilityText: Place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on each planet you control. You may choose and flip 1 policy card. Then, purge this card.

name: Saint Binal
title: The Prophet
abilityName: Blessing of the Ancients - Forgotten Sorcery
abilityText: Place this card and up to 3 non-faction technologies near the game board, you gain those technologies. At the start of the next strategy phase, purge all but 1 of those technologies and this card.

name: Roh'Vhin Dhna mk4
title: Ruthless Executive
abilityWindow: After you move 1 or more of your ships into the active system:
abilityText: You may purge this card to produce ships using the PRODUCTION abilities of any units in the active system as if they were your own, regardless of whether that system contains another player's ships.

name: Turra Sveyar
title: Shadow Councilor
abilityName: Contract Network - Friends in Low Places
abilityWindow: After another player scores a secret objective:
abilityText: You may attach, or remove and attach, this card to that secret objective. You treat the attached secret objective as if it were a public objective. After you score the attached objective, purge this card.

name: Putriv Sirvonsk
title: Clanmaster Prime
abilityText: For each control token that belongs to another player on your faction sheet, you may return that token. If you do, that player must give you 1 of their trade goods, 2 of their commodities, or 1 promissory note from their hand, if able. Then, purge this card.

name: Dyln Harthuul
title: Vice Admiral of Fleet Group 15
abilityText: Remove 1 of your command tokens from the board and gain 1 command token. Until the end of this tactical action, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships and the result of each of your ships' combat rolls. At the end of this turn, purge this card.

name: Auberon Elyrin
title: Chairman
abilityText: For each planet that has a Branch Office attachment, you may gain 1 unit upgrade technology of the same unit type as 1 owned by the player that controls that planet. Then, purge this card.

name: Zelian R
title: The Destroyer
abilityWindow: After you move a unit with BOMBARDMENT into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex:
abilityText: You may gain trade goods equal to the total combined resource values of planets in that system. If you do, destroy all units on planets in that system and replace that system tile with the Zelian asteroid tile. Then, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

name: Dirzuga Ohao
title: Treasures Of Nestphar
abilityText: You may replenish your commodities.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Solann Aun Kamaki
title: Punish Ambivalence
abilityText: You may force them to remove 1 token from their tactic pool and return it to their reinforcements.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: What Hope Flees From
title: Inexorable Doom
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may capture 1 unit from your reinforcements with a cost less than or equal to the number of players that cast votes for the resolved outcome.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: San Omairo
title: Pathmaker
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose a player who voted for that outcome. If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may place or move a Creuss wormhole token into a non-home system that contains a planet that player controls.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Cuventa
title: The Lidded Eye
abilityText: You may predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, you may place a frontier token in a system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Huldran
title: Return On Investment
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You and each other player that voted for that agenda gains 1 trade good.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Yaluga Huin
title: University Headmaster
abilityText: Each player that votes for the outcome you predict or vote for gains additional votes equal to the number of planets with technology specialties they exhausted.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Elder Junn
title: Qualified Immunity
abilityWindow: When a Directive agenda is resolved:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card and spend a command token from your strategy pool to ignore the effects of that agenda.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: A6AH3
title: Calculated Presence
abilityText: You may exhaust 1 planet adjacent to 1 or more of your dreadnoughts.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Legate Erran
title: Wheels Of Industry
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may place 1 cruiser or destroyer in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Keer En Hanaan
title: Archon Of Unity
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose a player who did not vote for that outcome. Replace 1 command token in your fleet pool with 1 from that players reinforcements if it does not already contain 1 of that player's tokens.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Cador Gim
title: An Offer You Cant Refuse
abilityText: Choose a player. That player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice, if able, or give you 2 trade goods or 1 promissory note.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Moltosh
title: Feed The Flames
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may gain a command token and place it in your strategy pool.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: H'eyra
title: Subtle Whisperer
abilityWindow: After the speaker abstains or votes on an agenda:
abilityText: You may exhaust 1 planet you control and add its influence value to your votes.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Tam And Kurn
title: Horizon Walkers
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may look at the top card of an exploration deck. if it is a relic fragment, you may exhaust this card to gain it.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Nekro Incisul
title: Network Infiltrator
abilityText: Choose an outcome and a player. If that player votes for that outcome, they gain additional votes equal to the number of technologies that player owns that you also own.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Kkarom Vett
title: Retrograde Negotiator
abilityWindow: After the speaker abstains or votes on an agenda you cast 5 or more votes on:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to change your vote to abstain, then ready up to 3 planets you control.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Qui'rek
title: Broodmaster
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may move up to 2 ground forces to adjacent planets you control.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Kelg Melkov
title: Logistics Officer
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may move 1 of your ships to an adjacent system that contains 1 or more of your ships or space docks.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Ronald Wiley
title: Political Rally
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may ready 1 planet.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Hermetecon
title: The Seeker
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may exhaust this card and choose a player who voted for the resolved outcome. Place or move 1 sleeper token onto a non-home planet that player controls that does not have a sleeper token.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Perdin Perdona
title: Echoes Of The Lazax
abilityText: You may add the influence value of either your Home Planet or Mecatol Rex (if you control it) to your votes without exhausting it.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: The Brothers Qquiar
title: Coalition Builders
abilityText: Each other player that votes for the outcome you predict or vote for gains 2 additional votes.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Brother Rhal
title: Evangelist
abilityWindow: After a player votes on an agenda:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to exhaust 1 planet controlled by that player and add that planets influence value to your votes.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Ne Ruk
title: Secret Keeper
abilityWindow: Before a player votes on an agenda:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card. that player must give you an action card from their hand or abstain.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Alessiar the Wise
title: Eternal Recurrence
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to look at the top card of the event deck. Then, the player may shuffle the event deck.

name: Neravi the Resolute
title: The Time That Remains
abilityWindow: When using the Leadership Primary or Secondary:
abilityText: You gain 1 command token for every 2 influence spent.
unlockCondition: An agenda you voted for or predicted is resolved.

name: Alvisa the All-Seeing
title: Differenda of Recognition
abilityText: Draw 5 unrevealed public objectives. Reveal 1 and place it near the public objective; shuffle the rest back into the deck. Then, purge this card.

name: Darktalon Treilla
title: Dark Matter Affinity
abilityText: Action: Gain 6 command tokens; you may redistribute any number of the command tokens on your command sheet. Then, purge this card.

name: Evelyn DeLouis
abilityWindow: At the start of a ground combat round:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card and choose a player involved in the combat; that player must assign 1 hit to 1 of their ground forces.

name: Viscount Unlenn
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat round:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system; that ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.
